flowRoot.flowPara: spectrograph: combines the slit (s) and the grating turret (gt); select the mirror or grating via axis "grating". The center wavelength can be selected via axis "wavelength". Axis "slit-in" allows fine adjustments of the slit.
spectrometer 1: combines the component spectrograph and detector 1
spectrometer 2: combines the component spectrograph and detector 2
l: additional non-moveable lens; functions as passive focusing optic
s: slit is needed for SPEC and therefore nearly closed (position: "off")
fw: rotatable emission filterwheel to select a specific wavelength band
m: passive mirror collimates the light and redirects it towards grating turret
gt: equipped with one mirror and one grating; switched to position 1 (grating);
m1: mirror to focus the light within the spectrograph on the detectors
m2: mirror to switch between two detectors (position 1 and 2)

flowPara.flowSpan: : manual slit to control the light intensity

flowRoot.flowPara: st-l: switchable optical lens; can be manually swapped by the user to change
st-sh: manual shutter to protect the streak unit from light
st-unit: device which sweeps the light based on the time
st-delay: converts and delays the e-beam pulse signal into a sweep trigger
st-ccd: streak unit readout camera (pixelated detector)
*optical path properties: contains parameters concerning the parabolic mirror and the lens system
*power control unit: power supply for the components:
det 1 and det 2 (depending on hardware), l1, l2, s1, spectrograph
l1: lens 1 position can be adjusted perpendicular to the optical axis;
b: light for spectrograph to calibrate the position offset between the two detectors the grating offset and the m1 position
ebeam: electron beam of the scanning electron microscope (SEM)

mirror: parabolic mirror to collect the cathodoluminescence (CL) light emitted by the sample; mirror is engaged into the beam path using its short and long axes and the fine adjustments are done via the x-y-referential
sample stage (optional): microscope stage to position sample
role: stage (axes: x, y, z, rz)
scan stage (optional): second stage for fine adjustment
ow: optical window, which is transparent for the CL light
trigger generator: device to control the e-beam pulse frequency
